oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate bond of March 25, 1863
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This $1000 bond was based on a loan authorized by the Confederate Congress on March 23, 1863, redeemable on April 1, 1893. Six percent per annum, payable semi-annually, would be paid upon surrender of the annexed coupons. It was entered by S. D. B. and; recorded by J. I. W. and signed by C. Rose, Register of the Treasury. This bond is number 5702.
